patthana15.89:1.1: Saraṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.89:2.1: Saraṇaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
